message.content:
I need to identify the value that represents the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

Looking at the income statement, the line item that typically represents this is "Cost of Goods Sold" since this represents the cost of inventory that was sold during the period.

In the given income statement, I can see:
- Cost of Goods Sold: 4680000.00 (dated 2024-01-29)

This is the value we're looking for, as it represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '4680000.00'}}
```
